name: Aileron Strike
description: Aileron Strike is a 3D on-rails shooter by day, twin stick top down romp by night. In this action-packed journey you will assume the role of Sage O'Donnell. This legendary bounty hunter is tasked with toppling down the Neotherian Space Pirates and its evil leader Codah. The Neotherians threaten the peaceful republic of stars known as the Celestial Union by toppling a remote planet known as Zeno. Will hope for the Celestial Union prevail with the help of O'Donnell? Or will the galaxy be doomed for all eternity.
